trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2013 This a requirement for using To download a free trial version of Visual Studio 2013, see Visual Studio Downloads.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2013 This a requirement for using To download a free trial version of Visual Studio 2013, see Visual Studio Downloads.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2014 Express with Tools Download Microsoft SQL Server Express for free at the Microsoft SQL Server Express Edition page.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2014 Express with Tools Download Microsoft SQL Server Express for free at the Microsoft SQL Server Express Edition page.

trans-unit.source: Choose the Download SQL Server Express and fill out your profile, choosing SQL Server 2014 Express with Tools, then click continue.
trans-unit.target: Choose the Download SQL Server Express and fill out your profile, choosing SQL Server 2014 Express with Tools, then click continue.

trans-unit.source: This starts the download of the installer for both SQL Server Express and the SQL Server Express Management Tools.
trans-unit.target: This starts the download of the installer for both SQL Server Express and the SQL Server Express Management Tools.

trans-unit.source: Save the installer package to your on-premises computer.
trans-unit.target: Save the installer package to your on-premises computer.

trans-unit.source: An on-premises computer You can run the Hybrid Connections Manger on the same on-premises computer as your SQL Server instance, or you can run each on a separate computer.
trans-unit.target: An on-premises computer You can run the Hybrid Connections Manger on the same on-premises computer as your SQL Server instance, or you can run each on a separate computer.

trans-unit.source: The computer on which the Hybrid Connection Manager runs must meet the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: The computer on which the Hybrid Connection Manager runs must meet the following criteria:

trans-unit.source: Be able to connect to Azure over port 5671.
trans-unit.target: Be able to connect to Azure over port 5671.

trans-unit.source: Be able to access the hostname:portnumber of the computer running your SQL Server instance.
trans-unit.target: Be able to access the hostname:portnumber of the computer running your SQL Server instance.
